In England, in the seven days to 12 May, there were 51,800 new confirmed cases (91.6 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 05 May, there were 62,306 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 17% (10,506 fewer cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 17 May is 18,681,566 (33,035.4 cases per 100,000 population).
